description: This file implements a React component that handles OAuth callback redirects in a Next.js application. It reads URL query parameters to determine the provider (Jira or Confluence), and redirects the user to the appropriate OAuth completion page or fallback route.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouter
methods.description: Main component that displays a fallback UI and wraps the inner callback handling component.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouterInner
methods.description: Handles processing of URL parameters and redirects the user to the correct OAuth completion route based on provider.
